item.description:
Please Update your RSVP for this Sundays final ScoreBoard Resevation.

We have had a bunch of Patriots Game Watching Events that have been well attended so this week we will return to our favorite suburban Sports Bar, Scoreboard in Woburn to watch the Patriots take on the Washington Redskins.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 18 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. Parking is free. More info at http://www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Our Assistant Organizer, Lauren manages Scoreboard and has kindly set aside a reserved section for us. Arrive early at 12:30pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing.

Game time is 1pm.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go and tip your servers. 

Join us early or later. Bring cool guests and friends.

There is no cover, however space is limited so please RSVP here and update so Scoreboard can handle us.

We hope to see you there!

Fenway Frank and the Red Sox Natives team.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to our reserved section.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party - Patriots vs Washington Redskins at Scoreboard in Woburn
